architectural_notes: Actor initialization should only call _initializeAccessControlWithSecret(adminToken) when an admin token is present (e.g., caffeineAdminToken in URL); otherwise skip to avoid blocking app startup in production.
known_issues: Live/production app stuck on loading screen because actor initialization awaits _initializeAccessControlWithSecret(adminToken) but production lacks caffeineAdminToken, causing initialization/profile fetch to never complete.

new_feature_requests.summary: Update the backend implementation of the `_initializeAccessControlWithSecret` call path so that when the provided secret token is missing/empty (e.g., production URL has no `caffeineAdminToken`), the call returns promptly and does not hang or block actor initialization.

Ensure that the backend initialization behavior for `_initializeAccessControlWithSecret` remains safe: invalid/empty secrets must not grant admin privileges and must not weaken existing authorization checks for normal operations.

projectName: Prevent production app from hanging on loading when caffeineAdminToken is missing
